alert.note: Alert for Northern Warren; Northern Washington; Southeast Warren; Southern Washington (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 6:29PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Warren and central Washington Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 629 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Comstock, or 7 miles east of Lake George Village, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause ponding of water on roads and in urban or poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Hudson Falls, Hartford, Comstock, Kingsbury, Mount Hope, Fort Ann, Cleverdale, South Bay, Middle Granville, Dunham Basin, Smiths Basin, Adamsville, North Granville, South Bay Village, Truthville, Raceville, Oneida Corners, Tripoli, Brayton and West Granville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Warren; Northern Washington; Southeast Warren; Southern Washington
